mosinstall.name: CB Login
mosinstall.author: JoomlaJoe and Beat
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 - 2007 Joomlapolis.com. This module is released under the GNU/GPL v2 License
mosinstall.description: Login module to be used with Community Builder instead of the Login module.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (mod_login), this allows individual module styling

param.name: horizontal
param.label: Module orientation
param.description: Default orientation is vertical for left or right module positions (recommended when displaying avatar). The horizontal orientation is for a compact horizontal module position and does NOT support avatar display.

param.name: compact
param.label: Display type
param.description: By default, the field names are displayed outside the boxes: username: [___] password: [___]. In compact mode, field names are inside fields: [username___] [xxx___] and texts are shorter.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed above the login form

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed below the login form

param.name: login
param.label: Login Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the login redirect to after login. If let blank will reload current page

param.name: logout
param.label: Logout Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the logout redirect to after logout. If let blank will reload current page. If set to index.php , it will go to home-page, avoiding unauthorized access messages.

param.name: show_lostpass
param.label: Lost password
param.description: Show/Hide the lost password? link

param.name: show_newaccount
param.label: Create account
param.description: Show/Hide the create account text and link

param.name: name_lenght
param.label: Username length
param.description: The length in characters the textbox should have not max. characters the box may contain.

param.name: pass_lenght
param.label: Password length
param.description: The length in characters the textbox should have not max. characters the box may contain.

param.name: login_message
param.label: Login Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Login Success

param.name: logout_message
param.label: Logout Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Logout Success

param.name: remember_enabled
param.label: Remember-me checkox
param.description: Show/Hide the standard Remember-me checkbox. It is possible to have it checked or unchecked by default or always

param.name: greeting
param.label: Greeting
param.description: Show/Hide the simple greeting text

param.name: name
param.label: Name/Username
param.description: Choose what to display with the greeting text

param.name: show_avatar
param.label: Show avatar when logged-in
param.description: Only for Vertical orientation: Select \'Show always\' to show avatar of the logged-in user or \'no image\' picture if none to encourage users to choose avatar. Select \'Show avatar only if chosen\' to avoid \'No image\' display. The \'Pending approval\' image is always displayed.

param.name: avatar_position
param.label: Avatar position
param.description: Default position means centered alone on a line. Left (recommended with avatar if enough space in template) means text flows on the right side of it. Right means the opposite.

param.name: pms_type
param.label: Private Messaging System
param.description: Choose the system you have installed.

param.name: show_pms
param.label: Private Messages Notification
param.description: Choose if you want to display count of unread PMS messages. PMS integration must be activated in CB configuration.

param.name: show_connection_notifications
param.label: Connections Notification
param.description: Choose if you want to display Connections notifications for pending approvals etc. Connections must be activated in CB configuration.

param.name: https_post
param.label: HTTPS (encrypted) login, register and lost password
param.description: You need https configured on your host for this. This feature is only in Joomla 1.0.13 + Joomla 1.5 and higher
param.option: use https for posting login then same
use https (encrypted) for login and after login
